data.title: Standard B Site Execute Sky Smokes
data.description: Here are the default smokes for an B Site execute. Follow how the smokes are placed on screen to best limit the Defender's options.

data.title: Standard A Site Execute Sky Smokes for Tower and Spawn
data.description: Here are the default smokes for an A Site execute. Follow how the smokes are placed on screen to best limit the Defender's options.

data.title: C Garage Split Sky Smoke Placements
data.description: If your team is able to successfully take space in Mid, then these smokes are perfect for a C Split, where your team sends some teammates up through Garage, and some teammates up through C Long to push into C Site at the same time.

data.title: Standard A Site Execute Sky Smokes for Garage and Spawn
data.description: Here are the default smokes for an A Site execute. Follow how the smokes are placed on screen to best limit the Defender's options.
